title: 0% Interest Financing
description: Spread your payments over time with absolutely no interest for qualified homeowners.

title: $0 Down Payment
description: Get started on your project today with zero money down—no upfront payment required.

title: No 12-Month Payments
description: Enjoy financing options with no payments due for the first 12 months, giving you extra budget flexibility. After deferment, estimated payments are $275–$325/month.

title: 50 Year Warranty
description: Yes you heard that right! A 50-year warranty—ensuring long-lasting protection and peace of mind.

title: Roofing Insurance Done for You
description: We handle your roofing insurance claims from start to finish—no stress, no headaches.

title: Low Credit Score Approval
description: Our financing program accepts credit scores as low as 550, with 120-month financing at APR 8%–25% (≈$250–$280/month) and 180-month financing at APR 9%–24% (≈$200–$240/month).

title: No Credit Check Financing
description: Finance without a credit check over 3–48 months at APR 7%–30%, with estimated payments of $475–$500/month.

title: Solar PPA Lease Options
description: No-credit-check lease options with 0.99%, 1.99%, or 2.99% escalator rates—must save at least $30/month compared to your current bill.

title: Solar Financing Options
description: Get a 30% federal tax rebate, SREC credits (~$800 for 10 kW), finance over 5–25 years at APR 3.99%–20%, with estimated payments of $70–$85/month.

title: Cash Deals
description: Pay cash and save: system cost $30,000–$35,000 before incentives; after 30% tax credit, cost is $21,000–$24,500.
